mapper.select: select round(avg(hd.dealAmount), 3) avgDealAmount, round(avg(hd.area)) avgArea, max(hd.floor) maxFloor, hd.aptCode aptCode, tmp.lat lat, tmp.lng lng, tmp.apartmentName apartmentName, tmp.address address from housedeal hd inner join (SELECT hi.aptCode, hi.apartmentName, concat(sidoName," ",gugunName, " ",dong, " ",roadName," ",jibun) address, lng, lat FROM houseinfo hi INNER JOIN dongcode dc ON hi.dongCode = dc.dongCode WHERE dc.dongName like #{keyword}) tmp on hd.aptCode = tmp.aptCode group by hd.aptCode
